description:
The battle between Tsuna’s Deathperation Point Zero Revised and Ghost comes to an end, but something doesn’t seem right. Tsuna absorbed Ghost’s flames, but his own flame power has not increased at all. Where did all of Ghost’s flame energy go? Finally, Byakuran arrives on the scene! But the guardians and the Varia are too exhausted after Ghost took their flame energy. Just then, the extent of Ghost’s true power is shown at the hands of Byakuran!
Source: crunchyroll
